title: Week 12 Waivers + Full Stream Ahead, #SomePoints - Fantasy Football Podcast for 11/23
description:
Week 12 Waiver Wire! The Fantasy Footballers are back with a new episode! On today’s fantasy football podcast, Week 12 waiver pickups and QB streamers! Plus, players to consider dropping, injury updates, and a new edition of “Where There’s Smoke, There’s Fire!” Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for November 23rd, 2021.
  
 (01:30) - Monday Night Recap: Giants at Buccaneers
 (09:15) - Where There’s Smoke, There’s Fire
 (14:50) - NFL News
 (26:00) - Waivers
 (27:25) - WR Waivers
 (41:00) - RB Waivers
 (49:50) - TE Waivers
 (51:50) - DST Streamers
 (54:20) - QB Streamers
  
 Connect with the show:
  Subscribe on YouTube
 Visit us on the Web
 Support the Show
 Follow on Twitter
 Follow on Instagram
  
 Check out today's sponsors:
